Name: Ocean Bow
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Mantyke and Mantine.  You can get an Ocean Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Mantyke Beam, a Mantyke Card, and a Waft Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
